channel.title: Suggestion: Ban Frell
channel.description:
Frell, often called the Narcissus of Moparscape, has exemplified his egocentrism in the post your picture thread and other threads enough.
This is moparscape, not bodybuilding.com
Get rid of him :mad:

item.title: Suggestion: Ban Frell
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:11, topic:464296”][code=Java]
public class Lol {

private static enum Fags {
	CLASSIC, FRELL;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
	int random = (int) (Math.random() * 2);
	System.out.println("BAN: " + getFag(random));
}

public static Fags getFag(int random) {
	switch (random) {
	case 0:
		return Fags.CLASSIC;
	case 1:
		return Fags.FRELL;
	}
	return null;
}

}
[/code]
Ready, go.[/quote]^ Most redundant code ever

OT - Banned Frell.

[quote=“casey., post:12, topic:464296”]corruption among the staff team, someone keeps making the poll answers biased.[/quote]That was Frell, but dont worry man I took care of it.

Read full topic

public class Lol {

	private static enum Fags {

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int random = (int) (Math.random() * 2);
		System.out.println("BAN: " + getFag(random));
	}

	public static Fags getFag(int random) {
		switch (random) {
		case 0:
			return Fags.CLASSIC;
		case 1:
			return Fags.FRELL;
		}
		return null;
	}
}

Ready, go.
